message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair for the first round.
Let's try a 55/45 split, considering the inflation, it's a good deal for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I'll be forced to take an even bigger share in the next round. Time is literally money!
I understand the pressure of inflation, but I won't back down. 58/42 split is my new offer. It's now or never!
